FuncDef:
The flexe-groupnum command configures the group number parameter of the FlexE group.
The undo flexe-groupnum restores the default group number parameter of the FlexE group.
By default, the group number parameter is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the group number parameter.
The value is an integer that from 1 to 1048574.

Examples: Warning: The traffic on related clients may be interrupted if the operation is performed. Continue? [Y/N]:y
Warning: The traffic on related clients may be interrupted if the operation is performed. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure proper communication between interworking devices, run the flexe-groupnum command on the interconnected FlexE groups to configure the same group number.
